Independent candidate Primorac came in second place, receiving the support of 19.38% of voters.

Title: ğŸ–¼Russian Washington forward Alexander Ovechkin scored an abandon...
Description: Russian Washington forward Alexander Ovechkin scored a goal in the away match of the NHL regular season against Toronto. The Russian was on the ice for the first time since November 19, when he suffered a fracture of the fibula in the third period of the away game with Utah. In the game against Toronto, he scored in the 57th minute into an empty net when the opponents replaced the goalkeeper with a sixth field player.

Title: Russian chess player Volodar Murzin won the World Rapid Champions...
Description: Russian chess player Volodar Murzin won the World Rapid Championship. The tournament takes place in New York. Based on the results of 13 games, Murzin scored 10 points. At the tournament, the 18-year-old chess player was seeded 59th.

Title: Mishustin signed a decree on the register of controlled persons f...
Description: Mishustin signed a decree on a register of controlled persons for migrant violators. The document was published on the official Internet portal of legal information. After being entered into the register, foreigners will be prohibited from changing their place of residence without permission from the Ministry of Internal Affairs, or traveling outside the boundaries of the subject of the Russian Federation or the municipality where they live.
